name 	 syntax 	 description 
help 	 help 	 Prints help message equal to this 
debug 	 debug 	 Just a debug command for testers 
login 	 login <username> <password> 	 Used to login into account or create new one 
clear 	 clear 	 Clears all console outputs 
cls 	 cls 	 Clears all console outputs 
lang 	 lang <language> 	 Changes current language. To get all languages use "lang" 
status 	 status <username> 	 Displays the player's status. Use "self" as name to show your status 
email 	 email <your mail> 	 Adds mail to your account 
password-recovery 	 password-recovery <username> 	 Send the password to the username email 
wiki 	 wiki <category> 	 Shows wiki about the game. To get more information use "wiki" 
inventory 	 inventory 	 Shows your inventory 
inv 	 inv 	 Shows your inventory 
sell 	 sell <item name> <count> 	 Used for dropping items 
buy 	 buy <item name> <count> 	 Used for acquire items 
chat 	 chat <function> <username> 	 Use "chat add <username>" to add chat with player. Use "chat remove <username>" to remove chat with player 
equip 	 equip <item name> 	 Use "equip <item_name>" where "item name" type is armor, weapon or heal to equip your person 
battle_heal 	 battle_heal 	 HELP_BATTLE_HEAL 
battle_enter 	 battle_enter <battle id> 	 HELP_BATTLE_ENTER

battle_attack 	 battle_attack <type> 	 HELP_BATTLE_ATTACK
